com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.type

Class TypeInfoSortComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.type.TypeInfoSortComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Comparator<TypeInfo<?>>

    public class TypeInfoSortComparator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<TypeInfo<?>>
    Comparator that compares TypeInfo by inheritance level.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TypeInfoSortComparator()
      Constructs the comparator with true to returnZeroForEquality.

      Constructs a TypeInfo comparator, which compares by inheritance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TypeInfoSortComparator

        public TypeInfoSortComparator(boolean returnZeroForEquality)
        Constructs a TypeInfo comparator, which compares by inheritance.
        Parameters:
        returnZeroForEquality - Whether the comparator should return 0 or not when both TypeInfo have same inheritance level. In some cases, using false may cause the comparator to change the order of elements when they have same inheritance level.

      • TypeInfoSortComparator

        public TypeInfoSortComparator()
        Constructs the comparator with true to returnZeroForEquality.
